remarks: ` I ` is a function that maps any real point to the point that in the partition that immediately precedes the corresponding periodic point in the interval.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
fourierdlem37.p $e |- P = ( m e. NN |-> { p e. ( RR ^m ( 0 ... m ) ) | ( ( ( p ` 0 ) = A /\ ( p ` m ) = B ) /\ A. i e. ( 0 ..^ m ) ( p ` i ) < ( p ` ( i + 1 ) ) ) } ) $.
fourierdlem37.m $e |- ( ph -> M e. NN ) $.
fourierdlem37.q $e |- ( ph -> Q e. ( P ` M ) ) $.
fourierdlem37.t $e |- T = ( B - A ) $.
fourierdlem37.e $e |- E = ( x e. RR |-> ( x + ( ( |_ ` ( ( B - x ) / T ) ) x. T ) ) ) $.
fourierdlem37.l $e |- L = ( y e. ( A (,] B ) |-> if ( y = B , A , y ) ) $.
fourierdlem37.i $e |- I = ( x e. RR |-> sup ( { i e. ( 0 ..^ M ) | ( Q ` i ) <_ ( L ` ( E ` x ) ) } , RR , < ) ) $.
fourierdlem37 $p |- ( ph -> ( I : RR --> ( 0 ..^ M ) /\ ( x e. RR -> sup ( { i e. ( 0 ..^ M ) | ( Q ` i ) <_ ( L ` ( E ` x ) ) } , RR , < ) e. { i e. ( 0 ..^ M ) | ( Q ` i ) <_ ( L ` ( E ` x ) ) } ) ) ) $.
